name: Box Clicker
summary: Are you ready to defeat all opponents? You can enhance your combat skills and increase your power with just a single tap, while obtaining new outfits to become a real boxer. Your speed is your most powerful weapon! Each opponent presents a different challenge and strategy, so you must time your attacks well and execute powerful combos. The faster you are, the more damage you can inflict! Download now and take your first step towards becoming a real fighter!
